description: Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!
controls: Use arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one.

title: Minesweeper
description: Clear the board without detonating any mines!
controls: Left-click to reveal a square. Right-click to flag a mine.

title: Tetris
description: Arrange the falling blocks and clear lines to score points.
controls: Arrow keys to move, rotate with up arrow or Z/X, space to drop.

title: Dino Game
description: Jump over obstacles as the dino in this endless runner!
controls: Press space or up arrow to jump.

title: Snake
description: Eat apples, grow your snake, and avoid running into yourself.
controls: Use arrow keys to move the snake.

title: Chess
description: Play chess against the computer at different skill levels.
controls: Click and drag pieces to move.
